text:
It's OK, only took me 10 mins or so of wracking my brain. Haha.

Here they are, in order of size/notoriety and also how quickly I remembered them. The ones in italics I have either worked at or have friends at so would recommend, not to say anything bad about the others, only I don't know what they are like to work for.

*VFX*
_Framestore_
_Double Negative/DNEG_
Moving Picture Company/MPC (closing down)
Industrial Light & Magic/ILM
_Technicolor_
_The Mill_
Molinare
CineSite
_Milk_ 
Nvizible
Prime Focus World
_One of Us_
BlueBolt
_Nexus Studios_
Peerless

Glassworks

Smoke & Mirrors
Ivor VFX
Automatick 
_Electric Theatre Collective_

Freefolk

INK

*Animation*
Locksmith Animation
_Mikros Image_
_Jellyfish Pictures_
_Blue Zoo_
_Passion Pictures_
_Tiger Aspect_
_Axis Animation_
Studio AKA
Magic Light
Hello Charlie
Thanks! Theres a few of those that I'll definitely be sending applications to. I didn't realise that MPC were closing down. Seems like everything is going badly for them right now.

I've been really into The Mill for awhile now. I've always liked the idea of going into advertising, but I'd imagine they're super competitive, since they're so huge.

I've kinda liked the look of animation too, especially Blue Zoo and Axis Animation, but I've never actually done character animation, and I don't think I'd be very good at it.

Do you know if there is much of a demand for Houdini stuff in animation? That's probably one of the areas I'm most interested in right now, along with Matchmoving.
